markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rebounding Breastplate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1070)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 188 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+3 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [greater fortification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_ absorbs impacts for later release. While wearing the armor, you gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and resistance 10 to [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) damage. Keep track of how much damage the armor prevents from enemy attacks, as the armor absorbs that damage. After 1 minute, the absorbed damage disperses harmlessly and resets to 0. Only damage caused by foes or hazards powers the armor, not damage you take from yourself, allies, or the environment.

<document level="2" id="action-861" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Rebounding Breastplate
